Text:
The video quality seems good, and the sound seems clear.  

Does anyone know where to find English subs for the first two movies in this pack?

I tried out about a half dozen different English subs, the following is correctly timed for this copy of Hanzaisha:

http://www.opensubtitles.org/en/download/sub/3178469

When I find English subtitles for Birds I will post a link to those as well.
Correct English subs for this release of Birds: nnhttp://subscene.com/english/dead-or-alive-2-the-birds/subtitle-166179.aspxnnThese are timed correctly with this copy of the film.
One more Time, English subs for the Birds::::nnhttp://subscene.com/english/dead-or-alive-2-the-birds/subtitle-166179.aspx
which is fine except the Italian is hard coded into the film.
